mapper.select: SELECT t.team_no ,t.team_no tem_no ,t.work_title ,t.work_content ,t.writer ,USERNAME(t.writer) as writer_name ,t.write_dt ,t.contract_no ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.region_code) as region_code ,r.request_no , (SELECT SUM(headcount) FROM team_work_category WHERE team_no = t.team_no) head_count FROM team t JOIN contract c ON c.contract_no = t.contract_no JOIN proposal p ON p.proposal_no = c.proposal_no JOIN request r ON r.request_no = p.request_no ORDER BY write_dt DESC
